title: Sittin’ Pretty
description: Kim and Misty are expecting their third college roommate when Hubble Wainwright the Third shows up.
altHero: Hubble Wainwright the Third, a very small man wearing a college sweater
alt1: Hubble lounges on the lawn with Kim and Misty, two blonde twins
alt2: the dean, an older man in a suit
alt4: Hubble arriving to Kim and Misty’s dorm room
